::Zardus::

Zardus nods, walking down the hallway toward the conference room.

"We never got finished with that conversation, but I have been 
wondering," he stops at a door and taps a button, entering the 
conference room and motioning for Lady Hawk to follow.

"Why did you come to this planet in the first place?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk followed curiously. Zardus was being a bit to civil for 
her
> liking. she'd seen this kind of leader before. talk nicely and wait 
for the
> other bot to drop thier gaurd. "If I recall corectly, yes we were." 
She
> didn't know what his next move would be but decided to play along.
